LanguageData.Plant_TreeBioHarbinger.label: Blackthorn
LanguageData.Plant_TreeBioHarbinger.description: Blackthorn is a bloodthirsty plant that slowly transforms bodies into biomatter..
LanguageData.ChoppedStump_BioHarbinger.label: A felled blackthorn stump
LanguageData.ChoppedStump_BioHarbinger.description: The stump left after a blackthorn bush has been cut down. The stump can be extracted, but it yields very little usable material. Left in the open, the stump will deteriorate over time.
LanguageData.SmashedStump_BioHarbinger.label: crushed blackthorn stump
LanguageData.SmashedStump_BioHarbinger.description: The remains of a blackthorn bush, destroyed by damage. It is ugly. The stump can be pulled out, but it yields very little useful material. Left outside, the stump will deteriorate over time.
LanguageData.BioHarbingeSeed.label: Blackthorn seed
LanguageData.BioHarbingeSeed.description: Blackthorn Bush Seed. Can be planted to grow a new Harbinger Tree that will eat any corpses or meat placed nearby.
